title: Systematic Inquiry-Based Science Simulation Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Core Scientific Theories and Experimental Procedures
context.additional_context: An in-company training program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, targeting the enhancement of scientific principle application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core variables of scientific phenomena with 80% accuracy using systematic exploration strategies in simulation environments
Learners can perform the hypothesis verification process through experimental design under limited parameter manipulation conditions at least three times.
Learners can structure and submit their exploratory results using scientific logic through project-based assessment tasks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
